translation.en: [woman 1] Newton's first law of motion.
translation.zh: 牛顿第一运动定律

translation.en: An object at rest, stays at rest.
translation.zh: 静止的物体会保持静止

translation.en: And an object in motion, stays in motion.
translation.zh: 而运动中的物体则会保持运动

translation.en: Basically, bodies keep on doing what they're doing.
translation.zh: 基本上 个体会按照现有模式持续运作

translation.en: It's simple. If you want to accelerate, you need more force.
translation.zh: 很简单 要想加速 就得增添动力

translation.en: I love laws. In physics and in life.
translation.zh: 我喜欢规则 无论是物理定律 还是生活中的法则

translation.en: So I became a lawyer.
translation.zh: 所以我当了律师

translation.en: And why Mergers and Acquisitions? Because I've always wanted to be the best.
translation.zh: 那为什么加入并购团队呢？ 因为我的目标从来都是成为最强者

translation.en: The toughest, smartest corporate lawyers do M&A.
translation.zh: 能做并购的 都是最精明强干的企业律师

translation.en: And a girl like me really needs to stay tough in a city like this.
translation.zh: 在这座城市里 像我这样的女孩尤其需要保持强悍

translation.en: See? Exhibit A.
translation.zh: 看见没？这就是证明

translation.en: I know if I work harder than anyone else, apply more force, I'll make partner.
translation.zh: 只要我比任何人都努力 再加把劲 我一定能成为合伙人

translation.en: They say being on the partner track
translation.zh: 有人说 在合伙人之路上前行 能让人发现真实的自己

translation.en: -is how you find out who you really are. -[mobile rings]
translation.zh: 有人说 在合伙人之路上前行 能让人发现真实的自己 （瑞秋弗莱德曼）

translation.en: Sorry. I'm coming up now. Sorry, I'm--
translation.zh: 抱歉 我就快到了 对不起 我…

translation.en: -[woman 2] You're doing it again. -What? Oh right.
translation.zh: 你又来了 什么？对哦

translation.en: Guys never apologize. Sorry.
translation.zh: 男人从不道歉 抱歉

translation.en: You know what else guys never do? Apologize for apologizing.
translation.zh: 为自己道歉的行为说抱歉 这种事男人也从来不做

translation.en: It's Waffle Wednesday.
translation.zh: 今天是周三 华夫饼日

translation.en: You know I love waffles, but forget me. Save yourself.
translation.zh: 你知道我爱吃华夫饼 但别管我了 你尽情享用吧

translation.en: Don't think I won't. I've sold my soul for a lot less than artisanal baked goods.
translation.zh: 别以为我不会这么干 手工烘焙的美食能让我出卖灵魂

translation.en: I need a new case, stat.
translation.zh: 我需要马上接个新案子

translation.en: What? I just wrapped the Weiland deal. I need to staff ASAP.
translation.zh: 怎么？威兰的案子结了 我得尽快投入下一单

translation.en: You have seriously worked nonstop for six years.
translation.zh: 你已经无休止地工作了六年

translation.en: It's in the bag.
translation.zh: 这回绝对稳了

translation.en: M&A's only promoting two, maybe three junior partners this year.
translation.zh: 并购团队今年 只会提拔两到三名初级合伙人

translation.en: Right. You, Dan, and Todd.
translation.zh: 对啊 你、丹 还有托德呗

translation.en: Maybe. We're neck and neck.
translation.zh: 也许吧 我们现在旗鼓相当

translation.en: Look. I just need one more heavyweight to lock it in.
translation.zh: 我需要再办一个大案子来奠定胜局

translation.en: You won't lose junior partner 'cause you're not staffed for one day.
translation.zh: 你不会因为一天没活干 就失去初级合伙人资格的

translation.en: I've been for two weeks.
translation.zh: 我都歇两周了

translation.en: Objection. Motive.
translation.zh: 反对 动机问题

translation.en: -You want to coast. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你是自己想歇口气

translation.en: -Girl, you need to relax. -Look, I can't.
translation.zh: -妹子 你需要休息 -不行

translation.en: I have to land a major deal before they decide who's making partner.
translation.zh: 我得趁合伙人人选敲定之前 拿下一个大单

translation.en: [woman 2] I'm in Litigation, but if you want intel on deal flow,
translation.zh: 我是做诉讼的 如果你想打听过手项目的情报

translation.en: your Mean Girls should have the hot goss.
translation.zh: 听那边的小贱人爆料去吧

translation.en: She turns around, she was a total bakkushan.
translation.zh: 可等她转过身来 却是个恐龙

translation.en: -[man 1] Oh. -Oh God. What is a bakkushan?
translation.zh: 天啊 恐龙是什么意思？

translation.en: A wide margin on the face-body quotient.
translation.zh: 身材和长相反差巨大

translation.en: As used in a sentence, "The bar was so dark,
translation.zh: 具体来说就是：“酒吧光线太暗

translation.en: Dan didn't notice his date was a bakkushan until it was too late."
translation.zh: 等到丹发现约会对象 是个恐龙的时候 已经太迟了”

translation.en: It means she looked like you from the back.
translation.zh: 意思就是她的背影瞧着像你

translation.en: But Dan from the front.
translation.zh: 但转过来却是个女版的丹

translation.en: -To my disappointment, she wasn't you. -Clearly. She was on a date with you.
translation.zh: -我很失望 她不是你 -会跟你约会 当然不是我

translation.en: -[men chuckle] -Are you coming?
translation.zh: -我很失望 她不是你 -会跟你约会 当然不是我 一起去吗？

translation.en: -There's Marty Adler. -And half the management committee.
translation.zh: -马蒂艾德勒在那边 -还有半个管理委员会的人

translation.en: It's hard to carry this firm on my shoulders, guys. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 扛起整个律所的担子真心不容易啊

translation.en: Looks like Marty's rain dance paid off.
translation.zh: 马蒂还真是长袖善舞啊

translation.en: Marty's not a rainmaker, he's a kingmaker.
translation.zh: 人家可是手握生杀大权的 不是一副花架子

translation.en: Whoever gets on his deal wins the golden ticket.
translation.zh: 谁能做他的案子 晋升合伙人就胜券在握了

translation.en: They're still promoting everyone who's tracking, right?
translation.zh: 他们还打算提拔合伙人之路上的人？

translation.en: What do you have to worry about, Mr. Gretchen Landrus?
translation.zh: 你有什么好担心的啊 格莱琴兰德斯先生？

translation.en: -Then there's London Boy. -Yeah, we got a new transfer.
translation.zh: -别忘了还有伦敦小子 -有个新人要转进来

translation.en: Into M&A? Now?
translation.zh: 来并购团队？现在？

translation.en: And I'm stuck on that Pharma Co. deal.
translation.zh: 可惜我制药公司的案子还没结

translation.en: Whichever of you gets to work with Marty will be guaranteed to make partner.
translation.zh: 你们谁要是能给马蒂做事 合伙人的位子就稳了

translation.en: That would be me. You know I love all you bakkushans, but…
translation.zh: 那必须是我啊 我这人虽然怜香惜玉

translation.en: this one's mine.
translation.zh: 但这案子我要定了

translation.en: -[sighs] -Go. Land that deal.
translation.zh: 去吧 拿下那个案子

translation.en: Waffles, anyone?
translation.zh: 谁想吃华夫饼？

translation.en: I have your mother on the line.
translation.zh: 你妈妈来电话了

translation.en: I'll call her back later,
translation.zh: 我晚点再给她打过去

translation.en: and I need all the intel on Marty Adler's new deal.
translation.zh: 我需要关于马蒂艾德勒 新交易的所有资料

translation.en: [woman 3] Your new paralegal.
translation.zh: 你新来的助手

translation.en: The hell is this?
translation.zh: 这什么情况？

translation.en: HR finally realized that giving Ingrid all the paralegals of color may be racist.
translation.zh: 人事部终于意识到分给英格丽的助理 全是有色人种 有种族歧视嫌疑了

translation.en: So, this week, she got…
translation.zh: 所以这周她就分到了…

translation.en: Get your feet off the goddamn desk.
translation.zh: 把脚从桌上拿下去

translation.en: She graduated number two in her class at Harvard Law,
translation.zh: 你还在科尔盖特挂科的时候

translation.en: while your ass was probably flunking Colgate.
translation.zh: 她就以全班第二的成绩从哈佛毕业了

translation.en: Show some freakin' respect.
translation.zh: 给我放尊重点

translation.en: What, no waffles?
translation.zh: 怎么 没有华夫饼了？

translation.en: Something way better.
translation.zh: 有比华夫饼好得多的东西

translation.en: So, who was that Brit you met all those years ago at Rosecliff?
translation.zh: 还记得你在罗斯克利夫 遇到的那个英国人吗？

translation.en: Rosecliff. Jane and Tony's wedding?
translation.zh: 罗斯克利夫 你是说简和托尼的婚礼？

translation.en: Yeah, you were Maid of Honor at that disaster, but you said you met…
translation.zh: 对 你做伴娘那次 简直是灾难现场 但你说那天遇到了… （《卡萨布兰卡》）

translation.en: Bogie.
translation.zh: …梦中情人

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: And you guys…
translation.zh: 而且你们…

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -对 -对

translation.en: And you said it was an instant connection. Fireworks. Upstairs bedroom.
translation.zh: 你说你俩一拍即合、干柴烈火 冲进了楼上的卧室

translation.en: He asked me if I meant what I said in my toast.
translation.zh: 他问我在祝酒词里说的 关于灵魂伴侣的事

translation.en: About soulmates.
translation.zh: 是不是认真的

translation.en: "Belief in true love is the same as believing in God
translation.zh: “相信真爱 一如信奉上帝

translation.en: because you believe in… [inhales] …destiny."
translation.zh: 因为你相信命运”

translation.en: That's when he said you had chocolate on your lips and kissed you.
translation.zh: 就在这时 他说你嘴上沾了巧克力 借机吻了你

translation.en: And then he said, "Not chocolate, marzipan…"
translation.zh: 然后他说：“不是巧克力 是杏仁酱…”

translation.en: -"Pineapple." -"Pineapple." It was nice.
translation.zh: -“菠萝” -“菠萝” 感觉还不错

translation.en: "Nice"? Girl, you said "love at first sight."
translation.zh: “还不错”？美女 你当时说的可是“一见钟情”

translation.en: You were using soulmate-level language.
translation.zh: 而且是灵魂伴侣那个级别的

translation.en: He was leaving for London the next day.
translation.zh: 他第二天就要去伦敦了

translation.en: -So we agreed "no names, no questions." -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 所以我们说好了不留名字和任何信息

translation.en: Where did you get that?
translation.zh: 这照片哪来的？

translation.en: The waffle station.
translation.zh: 华夫饼分派站

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: What is he doing here?
translation.zh: 他怎么会在这儿？

translation.en: The love of your life from how long ago?
translation.zh: 真爱降临了啊 你俩多久没见了？

translation.en: Okay. He's not the love of my life.
translation.zh: 好吧 他不是我的真爱

translation.en: -Six years ago. -Oh my God, Ingrid.
translation.zh: -六年 -天啊 英格丽

translation.en: This is exactly what you need.
translation.zh: 这简直是命运的安排啊

translation.en: We're gonna be 30, and you've dated a grand total of three guys.
translation.zh: 我们眼看就要奔三了 你还只交过三个男朋友

translation.en: Three. My 13-year-old niece has more experience than you, which is not cool.
translation.zh: 三个 连我13岁的侄女 都比你经验丰富 虽然那不是啥好事

translation.en: Seriously, Ingrid… [scoffs]
translation.zh: 英格丽 你的生命中 不是只有成为合伙人这一件事

translation.en: …life is not just about making partner. You gotta get out there and live a little.
translation.zh: 英格丽 你的生命中 不是只有成为合伙人这一件事 你得出去好好享受生活

translation.en: I will. After I make junior partner.
translation.zh: 我会的 等我成为了初级合伙人以后

translation.en: Speaking of, I've got a department meeting.
translation.zh: 我要去参加部门会议了

translation.en: Good luck with you-know-who. And I don't mean Marty Adler.
translation.zh: 祝你跟那个谁相处愉快 我说的可不是马蒂艾德勒哦

translation.en: I want this deal. I'm your guy.
translation.zh: 我想办这案子 我就是你要找的人

translation.en: [man 2] Tyler, we all want you on this case, but we need a reason to take Gavin off.
translation.zh: 泰勒 我们也想把案子交给你 但总不能无缘无故把盖文踢出局吧

translation.en: Okay. Hey, look. Not only have I pitched six new clients,
translation.zh: 我不仅拉到过六个新客户

translation.en: I started reading Vogue, Teen Vogue, and Women's Wear Daily when I was 11.
translation.zh: 而且从11岁就开始阅读《时尚》 《少女时尚》和《女装日报》了

translation.en: I know Alexander McQueen didn't know couture until Givenchy,
translation.zh: 我知道亚历山大麦昆在去纪梵希之前 根本不懂高级时装

translation.en: and unlike Gavin Dunmore, I actually know the difference between polyester and wool.
translation.zh: 而且跟盖文丹摩不同 我能分得清聚酯纤维和羊毛

translation.en: [man 2] Fine. It's yours.
translation.zh: 好吧 这案子归你了

translation.en: You won't be sorry.
translation.zh: 你不会后悔的

translation.en: Luxe for Raymond Vanderlin.
translation.zh: 雷蒙凡德林的奢侈品牌

translation.en: Yes! Remember when you're running Luxury Goods,
translation.zh: 太棒了！打理奢侈品的时候

translation.en: I want a huge discount on all client products.
translation.zh: 客户的所有产品都要给我折扣哦

translation.en: Girl, you won't need it because you'll be running this place.
translation.zh: 你不需要折扣 你很快就是这里的合伙人了

translation.en: By the way, can you believe there is not one but two Asian American first-years?
translation.zh: 对了 我们这儿居然 一下来了两个亚裔新人 神奇吧？

translation.en: Wait. What?
translation.zh: 慢着 什么？

translation.en: Don't they annihilate each other in a flash of energy and release a photon?
translation.zh: 不怕他们斗个头破血流 留下一地炮灰吗？

translation.en: Come say hi to the kids at the reception tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚去欢迎会上跟孩子们打个招呼吧

translation.en: Not if I get on Marty Adler's new deal.
translation.zh: 除非我没接上马蒂艾德勒的新案子

translation.en: -[telephone ringing] -[exhales]
translation.zh: （帕森瓦伦汀和亨特律师事务所）

translation.en: I'm so sorry. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 真对不起

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Hi. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Ingrid.
translation.zh: 我是英格丽

translation.en: Ingrid Yun?
translation.zh: 英格丽允？

translation.en: Jeff Murphy. It's a pleasure to meet you.
translation.zh: 我是杰夫墨菲 幸会

translation.en: We've met. Jane and Tony's wedding?
translation.zh: 我们见过面 在简和托尼的婚礼上

translation.en: Oh, that's right. Of course. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对哦 当然了 是的

translation.en: -You don't remember. -No, I do. Of course, I do.
translation.zh: -你不记得了 -没有 我当然记得

translation.en: No. You had on that dress, right? Very pretty dress.
translation.zh: 你穿着那条裙子 对吧？ 很漂亮的裙子

translation.en: Oh, that pink thing?
translation.zh: 粉红色那条？

translation.en: That's the one. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对 就是它

translation.en: It was blue.
translation.zh: 我那天穿的蓝色

translation.en: Well, I had a lot to drink that night.
translation.zh: 我那晚喝多了

translation.en: Apparently.
translation.zh: 显然是

translation.en: I didn't do anything embarrassing, did I?
translation.zh: 我没做什么让人尴尬的事吧？

translation.en: No. You were an absolute gentleman.
translation.zh: 没有 你非常绅士

translation.en: Was I?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Is that letter or spirit of the law, Counselor?
translation.zh: 你是字面意思还是别有深意？

translation.en: Clearly you're not compos mentis, so I'll let you off with a warning.
translation.zh: 显然你头脑不太清晰 所以我就放你一马好了

translation.en: -This time. -How magnanimous of you.
translation.zh: 你真是宽宏大量

translation.en: You're the transfer from London.
translation.zh: 你就是从伦敦转来的新人

translation.en: Guilty as charged.
translation.zh: 正是在下

translation.en: I take it you're in M&A too. What year are you in?
translation.zh: 你也是并购团队的吧 年资多久了？

translation.en: -Sixth. -So you're the competition.
translation.zh: -六年 -看来我们是竞争对手了

translation.en: -Don't flatter yourself. -You think you're that good?
translation.zh: -少往自己脸上贴金 -你自我感觉这么好吗？

translation.en: Better.
translation.zh: 比你想的还要好

translation.en: Yun, should we be jealous?
translation.zh: 允 我们该吃醋吗？

translation.en: Jeff Murphy. Just transferred from across the pond.
translation.zh: 我是杰夫墨菲 刚从大洋彼岸转过来

translation.en: -Dan Fallon. -Todd Ames. You're from London?
translation.zh: -丹法伦 -托德安姆斯 你从伦敦来？

translation.en: -Um, well, thereabouts. -I used to summer in Kent.
translation.zh: -差不多吧 -以前我夏天常去肯特度假

translation.en: Oh yeah. I spent a lot of time in Knole Park.
translation.zh: 是嘛 我以前也常去北帕克

translation.en: I'm Hunter, like the green.
translation.zh: 我叫亨特 大亨的亨

translation.en: [Murphy] Nice to meet you, Hunter.
translation.zh: 幸会 亨特

translation.en: [man 3] Mr. Adler. Ma… Marty. Marty Adler.
translation.zh: 艾德勒先生 马蒂艾德勒

translation.en: -[Dan] Oh God. -I'm Caleb Sanders.
translation.zh: -天啊 -我是凯勒桑德斯

translation.en: I'm a first-year here at Parsons.
translation.zh: 帕森的一名一年级律师

translation.en: I am really excited to be here. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 能来到这里 我真的很激动

translation.en: May I ask a question?
translation.zh: 能问您一个问题吗？

translation.en: Don't fucking ask permission to ask a question.
translation.zh: 问问题之前 别他妈征求同意

translation.en: Just ask the fucking question.
translation.zh: 直接问就好

translation.en: -[chuckles] Of course. -[man 4] Come on, man
translation.zh: -当然 -不是吧 这小子

translation.en: So in intellectual property law, we studied the Lexion-Huntsman case,
translation.zh: 我们在知识产权法课上 学了莱西恩亨兹曼的案子

translation.en: and how you handled the patent issues was brilliant. And I--
translation.zh: 您处理专利问题的方式太妙了 我…

translation.en: Stop. Stop talking.
translation.zh: 停 别说了

translation.en: Sanders, right?
translation.zh: 桑德斯 对吧？

translation.en: No one's buying your wide-eyed ingénue act.
translation.zh: 别跟我睁大眼睛扮天真 没用的

translation.en: -It's manipulative and a cliché. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 这种操控人心的手段太老套了

translation.en: And stop laughing. It's making me mad. Laughter is a coward's expression of fear.
translation.zh: 还有 收起你的笑脸 看得我心烦 笑容是懦夫害怕的表现

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: You know, I've asked them to move this paragraph three times.
translation.zh: 我都跟他们说三遍了 把这段改动一下

translation.en: They really should go over Marty Adler in orientation.
translation.zh: 他们真该在迎新会上 跟人介绍一下马蒂艾德勒

translation.en: -Sorry. -Read your audience, pal.
translation.zh: -抱歉 -学学察言观色吧 兄弟

translation.en: -[Hunter] Beautiful. -You in for bingo?
translation.zh: -漂亮 -要玩宾果游戏吗？

translation.en: -Sure. I'll go with "kick the tires." -I'm going with "circle the wagons."
translation.zh: -好啊 我猜“小试牛刀” -我猜“严阵以待”

translation.en: -"Knock it out of the park" for me. -20 bucks buy-in.
translation.zh: 我猜是“一举拿下” 20美元买入

translation.en: Whoever's Phrase that Pays gets spoken first, wins. Feeling lucky?
translation.zh: 谁猜的词先被提到算谁赢 想碰碰运气吗？

translation.en: Sure. Let's go with "slippery slope."
translation.zh: 当然 那我就猜“滑坡效应”吧

translation.en: I thought you were the competition.
translation.zh: 我还以为你是个对手呢

translation.en: Fair enough.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: How about "align incentives." No. "Boil the ocean."
translation.zh: 那“调整激励机制”怎么样？ 不 还是“好高骛远”吧

translation.en: Ah, I don't know. "Most impactful."
translation.zh: 我不知道 我猜是“最有效的”

translation.en: -You did that last time. -And it's not really a phrase.
translation.zh: -你上回猜过了 -而且那就是个形容词

translation.en: All right, people. Take your seats, please.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 请入座

translation.en: Let's go, you wanna work today or what?
translation.zh: 斯加利 你今天还要不要做事了？

translation.en: Let's start with the Alcor deal.
translation.zh: 先从阿尔科的案子说起

translation.en: Last week, we went in, we kicked the tires,
translation.zh: 上周 我们小试牛刀了一下

translation.en: this week, we're gonna take this baby out for a spin.
translation.zh: 上周 我们小试牛刀了一下 这周我们要采取实际行动了

translation.en: Which reminds me.
translation.zh: 这刚好提醒了我

translation.en: I want you to take care of the shell corporation
translation.zh: 我们今早聊过的那个空壳公司

translation.en: that we talked about this morning.
translation.zh: 就交给你处理了

translation.en: I need to take a deposition for my effing uncle. Okay?
translation.zh: 我得去帮我的叔叔取证词 好吧？

translation.en: On to new business.
translation.zh: 现在开始说新生意

translation.en: Sun Corp, big-time energy conglomerate in Houston, is acquiring Min Enterprises.
translation.zh: 休斯顿的大型能源公司 太阳集团 要以29亿美元收购闵氏企业

translation.en: A clean-tech play for 2.9 billion.
translation.zh: 发展清洁能源技术

translation.en: [Dan] Whoo! That's real money. [Marty] This deal could make or break our year.
translation.zh: -大手笔啊 -这桩生意事关律所今年的成败

translation.en: So nobody breathes a word of this.
translation.zh: 谁也不准走漏半点风声

translation.en: -Are you available, Fallon? -Willing and able.
translation.zh: -你有空吗 法伦？ -乐意效劳

translation.en: [Marty] Excellent.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: I can draft up a quick and dirty NDA, get that signed ASAP.
translation.zh: 我可以即刻起草一份保密协议 尽快让所有人签字

translation.en: Great, Yun. So, Fallon, I want you to sit in on the kickoff this afternoon.
translation.zh: 很好 允 那么法伦 今天下午的项目启动会 你列席旁听

translation.en: Ted Lassiter, Sun Corp CEO, is coming at three o'clock.
translation.zh: 太阳集团的首席执行官泰德拉希特 3点钟要过来

translation.en: -Love to. -[Marty] Great.
translation.zh: -乐意之至 -很好

translation.en: I worked on an oil and gas client last year,
translation.zh: 我做过一个油气公司的案子

translation.en: Chevron divested its holdings in Mexico's Royale Oil.
translation.zh: 雪佛龙售出了 在墨西哥皇家石油的股份

translation.en: So I know all about family-owned energy and all those tricky regulatory issues.
translation.zh: 所以我了解家族能源企业 和各种棘手的管理问题

translation.en: Great. Yes, Yun, you sit in on the kickoff as well.
translation.zh: 很好 允 你也参加会议

translation.en: Make sure we're ready to go at three o'clock.
translation.zh: 务必做好与会准备

translation.en: Absolutely. Yes. My pleasure.
translation.zh: 当然 好的 荣幸之至

translation.en: And remember, this deal is highly confidential.
translation.zh: 记住 这桩交易是绝密

translation.en: If anything leaks, the deal is done.
translation.zh: 如果走漏了风声 交易就泡汤了

translation.en: If this gets out, I will fucking tear up your license myself.
translation.zh: 谁要敢泄露消息 我会亲手撕了他的执业证

translation.en: We have billable hours. Let's work. Come on.
translation.zh: 我们可是按时间收费的 快开始干活吧

translation.en: [Dan] He's talking about you.
translation.zh: 他说的是你

translation.en: He looked at me?
translation.zh: 他朝我这看了吗？

translation.en: This will be fun.
translation.zh: 这下有意思了

translation.en: Why don't you run that NDA by me before the meeting?
translation.zh: 开会前给我看一遍你的保密协议

translation.en: Sure, Dan. Should I tell you when I take a shit too?
translation.zh: 好啊 丹 我拉屎也要跟你汇报吗？

translation.en: Oh, vulgar. Come on, Yun. Don't be like that.
translation.zh: 真粗俗 拜托 允 别这样

translation.en: One of us has to run point, and Marty called on me first, so…
translation.zh: 我俩总得有个人牵头 而刚才马蒂先找的我 所以…

translation.en: I look forward to reviewing that NDA.
translation.zh: 我很期待校阅你的保密协议

translation.en: -Did he just call you a paralegal? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 他刚刚那是把你当律师助理了吗？

translation.en: Sometimes I just wanna punch Dan Fallon in his smug, entitled face.
translation.zh: 有时候我真想一拳打烂 丹法伦那张自以为是的脸

translation.en: Welcome to the jungle, London.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到弱肉强食的世界

translation.en: Oh, don't worry.
translation.zh: 别担心

translation.en: -I can see who the real competition is. -[Ingrid sighs]
translation.zh: 我看得出谁才是真正的对手

translation.en: [Ingrid] Justin, they're coming soon. Get off your phone.
translation.zh: 贾斯汀 他们就快来了 放下手机

translation.en: You're early.
translation.zh: 您提前到了

translation.en: If you're early, you're on time. If you're on time, you're late.
translation.zh: 提前等于准时 踩点等于迟到

translation.en: Punctuality is a virtue.
translation.zh: 守时是一种美德

translation.en: Ted Lassiter.
translation.zh: 我是泰德拉希特

translation.en: Hey. Um, Justin Coleman.
translation.zh: 你好 我是贾斯汀科曼

translation.en: [Lassiter] Justin, nice to see you.
translation.zh: 贾斯汀 幸会

translation.en: When you get a sec, can we get some Pellegrino brought up?
translation.zh: 劳烦给我们拿点气泡水过来好吗？

translation.en: Of course. Justin, please call dining services and let them know.
translation.zh: 当然 贾斯汀 请致电通知餐饮服务部

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Well, shoot. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 唉呀 这下尴尬了

translation.en: Ingrid Yun. I'm the senior associate on the deal. It's great to meet you, Ted.
translation.zh: 我是高级律师英格丽允 幸会 泰德

translation.en: Ted Lassiter. No hard feelings, I hope.
translation.zh: 泰德拉希特 希望你不要介意

translation.en: You just don't look a day over 18 to me. You folks are lucky that way, right?
translation.zh: 因为你看起来就像个18岁的小姑娘 这对你们女孩子来说是好事吧？

translation.en: -[scoffs] -This is my general counsel. That's Mark Traynor.
translation.zh: 这是我的法律总顾问 马克崔纳

translation.en: -Ted. [chuckles] -[Lassiter] Marty!
translation.zh: -泰德 -马蒂！

translation.en: -Good to see you. -Good to see you.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你 -很高兴见到你

translation.en: How are you, Mark? This is Dan Fallon, senior associate.
translation.zh: 你好吗 马克？这是高级律师丹法伦

translation.en: -Hi. -[Lassiter] Hi, Dan.
translation.zh: -你好 -你好 丹

translation.en: You've met Ingrid Yun. Brought my best and my brightest for you.
translation.zh: 这是英格丽允 你已经见过了 我为你挑选了律所的顶尖人才

translation.en: Shall we?
translation.zh: 我们开始吧？

translation.en: [Dan] Ted, when I was on MacKenzie, I ran so many Liquid Natural Gas models,
translation.zh: 泰德 我在万信工作时 运算过很多液化气的模型

translation.en: I was dreaming accretion and dilution analysis in my sleep.
translation.zh: 做梦都在分析每股收益得失

translation.en: It always helps to have someone who knows how we run the numbers.
translation.zh: 有个了解我们数字运作的人在 可真是太好了

translation.en: So, what's happening with their top execs?
translation.zh: 那边的高管人员有什么反应？

translation.en: Most of 'em are parachuting out,
translation.zh: 大部分都跳槽了

translation.en: but we are mainly interested in keeping Jack Barstow on.
translation.zh: 但我们只要杰克巴斯托能留下来就行

translation.en: -Franklin Min's right-hand man. -That's right
translation.zh: -富兰克林闵的左右手 -没错

translation.en: Barstow spent three years slaving away to get their offshore drilling ops running.
translation.zh: 巴斯托苦心经营了三年 才让海上钻井平台开始运作

translation.en: And now he learns old man Min's lookin' to sell?
translation.zh: 如今却得知老闵要卖公司？

translation.en: I bet he's pissed.
translation.zh: 我猜他一定很生气

translation.en: Barstow was seen meeting with Ken Fox of Chevron on Monday.
translation.zh: 有人看见巴斯托 周一面见了雪佛龙的肯福克斯

translation.en: If you want Barstow, we definitely need a key-man provision.
translation.zh: 要想留住巴斯托 就得拟定关键人条款

translation.en: What'd I tell you, Ted? The best and the brightest.
translation.zh: 我没骗你吧 泰德？顶级精英

translation.en: -It's a problem. -There's no problems here today.
translation.zh: -这是个问题 -今天在这里完全没问题

translation.en: I know you're new, but paralegals are supposed to sit by the wall, not at the table.
translation.zh: 我知道你是新来的 但律师助理应该坐在墙边而不是桌边

translation.en: Okay. Whatever.
translation.zh: 好 随便吧

translation.en: Ted, your junior year game against the Bulldogs is legendary.
translation.zh: 泰德 你大三时 跟斗牛犬队的那场比赛真是太传奇了

translation.en: Five goals, four assists, six caused turnovers.
translation.zh: 五次进球 四次助攻 六次造失误

translation.en: -You play? -I was a midfielder.
translation.zh: -你也打球？ -我是中场队员

translation.en: -Gerri Hayes was our head coach. -No kidding.
translation.zh: -杰瑞海斯是我们的主教练 -真的假的？

translation.en: Gerri was our assistant coach back in the day.
translation.zh: 杰瑞当时是我们的助理教练

translation.en: Gerry's my man.
translation.zh: 我跟杰瑞是好哥们

translation.en: He actually retired a few years ago. But I see him every year at the game.
translation.zh: 他几年前退休了 但我每年都会跟他一起看比赛

translation.en: -[Lassiter] Well, say hi to him for me. -Will do.
translation.zh: -替我向他问好 -没问题

translation.en: All right. Go Crimson.
translation.zh: 好吧 绯红队加油

translation.en: "Go Crimson."
translation.zh: “绯红队加油”

translation.en: [Ingrid] Do you think Marty will be at the first-year drinks?
translation.zh: 你觉得马蒂 会参加一年级律师的酒会吗？

translation.en: Don't change the subject. Jeff Murphy doesn't remember you?
translation.zh: 别转移话题 杰夫墨菲不记得你了？

translation.en: If he does, he's not letting on.
translation.zh: 就算记得 他也没表现出来

translation.en: Are we talking about Mr. Pineapple Marzipan?
translation.zh: 你们是在聊菠萝杏仁酱先生吗？

translation.en: Be careful with that one, Ing.
translation.zh: 你可长点心吧 小英子

translation.en: Wait. What? Just this morning you were all about true love and soulmates.
translation.zh: 怎么？你今天早上 还一直跟我说真爱、灵魂伴侣呢

translation.en: Before I learned he was pretending not to remember.
translation.zh: 那是在他假装不记得你之前

translation.en: I don't care if he's the devil.
translation.zh: 我才不管他是不是渣男呢

translation.en: When's the last time our girl's been hot and bothered?
translation.zh: 你什么时候见她这么心烦意乱过了？

translation.en: When she found out she could take Trusts and Estates and IP as a 2L.
translation.zh: 发现法学二年级可以选修 信托财产和知识产权课的时候

translation.en: Or when they extended the library hours to 24/7?
translation.zh: 或者图书馆延长到全天开门的时候？

translation.en: Or when the Law Review went monthly instead of quarterly?
translation.zh: 《法律评论》从季刊改为月刊的时候

translation.en: Or when the Law Rev--
translation.zh: 或者是《法律评…

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay! I get it.
translation.zh: 好啦！我懂你们的意思

translation.en: But he doesn't remember,
translation.zh: 但他根本不记得我了

translation.en: so even if I wanted to, it's clear he doesn't feel the same.
translation.zh: 就算我想怎么样 他也没那个意思

translation.en: Ugh, I need a drink.
translation.zh: 我需要喝一杯

translation.en: [Ingrid] Hi, Javi.
translation.zh: 你好 哈维

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Ingrid. Such an old-fashioned name.
translation.zh: 英格丽 真是个老派的名字

translation.en: My parents saw Casablanca on their first date.
translation.zh: 我父母初次约会时 一起看了《卡萨布兰卡》

translation.en: So you're a workaholic and a romantic.
translation.zh: 所以你既是工作狂 又是一个浪漫主义者

translation.en: The film's about doing the right thing.
translation.zh: 电影的主旨是要人做正确的事

translation.en: We're in M&A. Not a lot of room for that sort of thing.
translation.zh: 我们身在并购团队 那种东西没有容身之地

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So you're a cynic.
translation.zh: 看来你挺愤世嫉俗啊

translation.en: Idealism doesn't pay the rent.
translation.zh: 理想主义没法帮你支付房租

translation.en: So you're in it for the money.
translation.zh: 所以你当律师是为了钱？

translation.en: What else?
translation.zh: 不然呢？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Like you need it.
translation.zh: 你又不差钱

translation.en: Oh Come on, Murphy. You summer in Kent just like…
translation.zh: 得了吧 墨菲 你夏天不是常在肯特度假吗？就像…

translation.en: just like him.
translation.zh: 像他一样

translation.en: [Dan] I know. What's this world coming to?
translation.zh: 是啊 现在这世道都成什么样了啊？

translation.en: I'm nothing like him, Ingrid.
translation.zh: 我跟他不一样 英格丽

translation.en: I've always been on the outside looking in.
translation.zh: 我一直都被排挤在外

translation.en: Just like you.
translation.zh: 就像你一样

translation.en: Tell me, why are you in law?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你为什么做律师？

translation.en: -Laws are what we value. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 没有规矩 不成方圆

translation.en: Murder is bad. Stealing is bad.
translation.zh: 谋杀是恶行 偷窃是劣迹

translation.en: Forgetting people you met at a wedding is bad.
translation.zh: 忘记自己在婚礼上遇到的人也很恶劣

translation.en: Is that illegal in the States?
translation.zh: 这在美国是违法的吗？

translation.en: It should be.
translation.zh: 它应该是

translation.en: Francine. Jesus, it's more old-fashioned than Ingrid.
translation.zh: （弗朗欣 你知道太阳集团的事吗？） 弗朗欣 天啊 这名字比英格丽还老套

translation.en: And reading other people's texts is definitely illegal.
translation.zh: 偷看别人短信绝对是违法的

translation.en: [Dan] London.
translation.zh: 伦敦小子

translation.en: See you around, Miss Bergman.
translation.zh: 回头见 褒曼小姐

translation.en: -[man 5] Can I get an Old-Fashioned? -[Javi] Yep.
translation.zh: -请给我来杯古典鸡尾酒 -好的

translation.en: You look way too nice to be friends with Dan.
translation.zh: 你看起来很友善 不像是丹的朋友

translation.en: [scoffs] The wise learn the most from their enemies.
translation.zh: 智者善于从敌人身上取长补短

translation.en: Are you a philosopher or a lawyer?
translation.zh: 你到底是哲学家还是律师呀？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: You… you remind me of a professor I had.
translation.zh: 你让我想起一个教授

translation.en: He was into philosophy and law.
translation.zh: 他也爱好哲学和法律

translation.en: Thomas Nagel.
translation.zh: 托马斯内格尔

translation.en: Wait. The Thomas Nagel?
translation.zh: 慢着 是那个托马斯内格尔吗？

translation.en: -You know him? -[Ingrid chuckles]
translation.zh: 你认识他？

translation.en: He was my thesis advisor on new theories of the mind, starting with his essay--
translation.zh: 他是我在新兴心智理论课题上的 论文导师 自从看了他那篇论文…

translation.en: -"What Is It Like to Be a Bat?" -Yes!
translation.zh: -《身为蝙蝠是什么感觉？》？ -对！

translation.en: I was obsessed with the mind-body problem.
translation.zh: 我对心身问题很感兴趣

translation.en: Nick Laren.
translation.zh: 我是尼克拉伦

translation.en: Ingrid Yun.
translation.zh: 英格丽允

translation.en: So, uh, wha… what is it like to be Ingrid Yun?
translation.zh: 那么 身为英格丽允是什么感觉？

translation.en: Hmm. That's the problem.
translation.zh: 问题就在这里

translation.en: No matter how close you and I ever get,
translation.zh: 无论你和我能发展到多么亲密

translation.en: you can never truly know what it's like to be me.
translation.zh: 你永远无法得知 成为我是什么感觉

translation.en: -Or I you. -Right.
translation.zh: -反之亦然 -没错

translation.en: The red I see will never be the same red you see, so why bother?
translation.zh: 你我眼中的红色从来都不尽相同 所以何必自寻烦恼呢？

translation.en: Right. I've no way of knowing if my brain isn't in a vat somewhere
translation.zh: 是啊 也许我的大脑 其实在某处的一个大桶里

translation.en: and all thisisn't just some simulation.
translation.zh: 而眼前这一切只不过是虚拟的场景呢

translation.en: I had a serious case of solipsism in college.
translation.zh: 我上大学时 曾一度深受唯我主义的困扰

translation.en: That was before I realized we're all here by sheer happenstance,
translation.zh: 但后来我意识到 所有人的存在都是纯属巧合

translation.en: an accident of string theory, a hiccup on a probability function.
translation.zh: 是弦理论下的一次偶然 概率函数中的一个小问题

translation.en: But I tell myself, in the face of the heat death of the universe
translation.zh: 但我告诉自己 哪怕宇宙面临热寂

translation.en: that we must supply our own light and our own wine.
translation.zh: 也要点亮自己的人生 还要有美酒作伴

translation.en: -I'll drink to that. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 说得好 我敬你

translation.en: Sorry. Back to the salt mines.
translation.zh: （贾斯汀科曼 什么是知识产权协议？） 抱歉 我得回去打工了

translation.en: Hey. So I know that free will is just an illusion,
translation.zh: 那个 我知道自由意志只是一个幻觉

translation.en: but what are you doing Friday?
translation.zh: 不过 你周五有安排吗？

translation.en: Hopefully not babysitting my paralegal.
translation.zh: 但愿不用照看我的助理

translation.en: I'm going to a thing at the Plaza. Would you like to join me?
translation.zh: 我要去参加广场酒店的晚宴 你想一起吗？

translation.en: Yes. I'd love to. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 好啊 乐意奉陪

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: See you Friday.
translation.zh: 周五见

translation.en: -Great. -If the simulation doesn't crash before.
translation.zh: -好 -如果这个虚拟现实没有崩塌的话

translation.en: -Right. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [woman ] Ingrid, have you heard from Marlena?
translation.zh: 英格丽 你有玛莉娜的消息吗？

translation.en: [in Korean] I called three times, but she didn't pick up.
translation.zh: 我给她打了三通电话都没人接

translation.en: [in English] I just want to be sure she's okay.
translation.zh: 我就想确认一下她平安无事

translation.en: Hey. It's Lina. Leave a message.
translation.zh: 嘿 我是莉娜 请留言

translation.en: -Namaste, bitches. -[voicemail beeps]
translation.zh: 合十敬礼 婊贝们

translation.en: Hey. It's me. Mom's worried about you.
translation.zh: 喂 是我 妈妈很担心你

translation.en: Just let her know you're okay.
translation.zh: 给她报个平安吧

translation.en: ♪ Staring back at me in the mirror ♪
translation.zh: （莉娜 我很好 忙着呢） （英格丽 你给妈妈回电话了吗？）

translation.en: [podcast host] So next, what is a MAC clause?
translation.zh: 那么接下来 什么是MAC条款？

translation.en: A MAC clause is a Material Adverse Change clause.
translation.zh: MAC条款 即“重大不利变化”条款

translation.en: It's a change in circumstance that affects a bargain after the deal is signed,
translation.zh: 适用于在交易签署日 和最终交割日之间

translation.en: but before it's been closed.
translation.zh: 发生的重大变化 （并购科学 关于条款书的考量）

translation.en: Something like an embargo, or a new tax law, or a regulatory change…
translation.zh: （并购科学 关于条款书的考量） 比如禁令的颁布、新税法的实施 或者管制条例的变更…

translation.en: [Ingrid] I want all the phase-one and phase-two reports.
translation.zh: 我要所有的一期和二期报告

translation.en: The full set, not abridged.

translation.en: The IP agreements and the lease and will docs too.
translation.zh: 还有知识产权协议、租约和遗嘱文件

translation.en: Why aren't you writing this down?

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt. Your mother's on the line. Sounds urgent.

translation.en: I've put her through on your cell.

translation.en: [in Korean] Mom, we texted yesterday.
translation.zh: 妈 我们昨天发过短信了

translation.en: Have you actually talked to her?
translation.zh: 你跟她说上话了吗？

translation.en: No, but…
translation.zh: 没有 但是…

translation.en: [in English] No one has talked to her in three days, Ingrid.

translation.en: Okay. I'll check on her.
translation.zh: 好 我去找她

translation.en: I want those docs by one o'clock.
translation.zh: 1点之前把所有文件交给我

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.

translation.en: Hey, it's me. Again.
translation.zh: 嘿 又是我

translation.en: Look, I'm outside your building. If you don't call me back in 5 minutes…

translation.en: Where are you? Text me you're alive, or I'll have to tell Mom.

translation.en: If you're on time, you're late.
translation.zh: 踩点等于迟到

translation.en: Marty Adler dropped by.
translation.zh: 马蒂艾德勒来过了

translation.en: -When? -[woman 3] An hour ago.
translation.zh: -什么时候？ -一小时前

translation.en: I told him you'd be right back, but I think he went looking for Dan.
translation.zh: 我跟他说你很快就回来 但他还是去找丹了

translation.en: [Dan] He shoots! He shoots!
translation.zh: 他投篮了！

translation.en: Go fetch.
translation.zh: 来抢球啊

translation.en: [Todd] I wanna be a baller, man.
translation.zh: 我也想打球 哥们

translation.en: [Dan] He shoots! He shoots!
translation.zh: 他投篮了！

translation.en: Aw, Yun, that was a perfect three-pointer.

translation.en: -Did Marty stop by? -Yeah. You just missed him.
translation.zh: -马蒂来过吗？ -对 你刚好错过了

translation.en: What did he want?
translation.zh: 他有什么事？

translation.en: Just checking in, running through any potential red flags.
translation.zh: 就是过来看看 处理可能存在的问题

translation.en: I thought that was the two o'clock.
translation.zh: 不是说好2点讨论的吗？

translation.en: Yeah. We just did it over lunch.
translation.zh: 对 但我们在午饭时间搞定了

translation.en: -So what were the red flags? -You know, land lease stuff…
translation.zh: -那都有哪些问题？ -关于土地租赁的呗…

translation.en: He was interested in what could come outta left field.
translation.zh: 马蒂在意所有可能出现的意外状况

translation.en: Did he mean "intangibles" like "goodwill" assets?
translation.zh: 是指商誉之类的无形资产吗？

translation.en: The Mins have a very valuable brand
translation.zh: 闵氏的品牌价值不菲

translation.en: and great relationships with their suppliers.
translation.zh: 跟供应商的关系也很好

translation.en: Ball.
translation.zh: 球

translation.en: Relax. I got it covered.
translation.zh: 放轻松 交给我就好

translation.en: You know that Plaza thing you're going to with Nick tomorrow night?
translation.zh: 你明天不是要和尼克去参加晚宴吗？

translation.en: I asked Rachel to go with me, and she flat-out said no.
translation.zh: 我邀请瑞秋跟我一起去 被她无情拒绝了

translation.en: Is it because I'm not Jewish?
translation.zh: 就因为我不是犹太人吗？

translation.en: It's because you're an arrogant ass, Dan.
translation.zh: 因为你是个傲慢自大的混蛋

translation.en: Yeah. Women love that.
translation.zh: 对 女人就爱这一款

translation.en: She likes the artsy type.
translation.zh: 她喜欢文艺型的

translation.en: I don't know, maybe we're attracted to what we wanna be, but we aren't.
translation.zh: 我不知道 也许人都会 被自己想要成为的样子吸引吧

translation.en: Speaking of which, you have an awesome dress for tomorrow, right?
translation.zh: 说到这个 你准备好 明天要穿的漂亮裙子了吧？

translation.en: I was gonna go out and buy one, but it's tight. We have Sun Corp tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我原本打算去买一条 但时间太紧 我们明天要去太阳集团

translation.en: Like I said, Yun, relax.
translation.zh: 我说了 允 放轻松

translation.en: I got it covered.
translation.zh: 交给我就好

translation.en: I'm coming for you! Hey!
translation.zh: 我来了！嘿！

translation.en: MVP, back in the game!

translation.en: All right, all right, all right. Check it up, check it up.

translation.en: Sorry, Marty. Didn't mean to interrupt.

translation.en: I just wanted to drop off the executed NDA. Sorry I missed--

translation.en: Lassiter is moving tomorrow up to 9:00 a.m. Is that gonna be a problem?
translation.zh: 拉希特把明天的见面会 提前到早上9点了 没问题吧？

translation.en: No. No problem.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: Be around later if I need you?
translation.zh: 今天晚点下班？我可能有事找你

translation.en: -Yes. I'll be here all night. -Good.
translation.zh: -好 我会待一整晚 -很好

translation.en: Anytime, Marty.
translation.zh: 随时恭候 马蒂

translation.en: [Marty] Roberta?
translation.zh: 萝伯塔？

translation.en: I'm sorry. I can't make it tomorrow.
translation.zh: 对不起 我明天去不了了

translation.en: Aw, you got a better offer?
translation.zh: 你有更好的安排了？

translation.en: Damn. That Tom Nagel does know how to cut a rug.

translation.en: Just come out for an hour.
translation.zh: 就过来待一个小时吧

translation.en: I'll have you back at the office before you can say "epistemology."
translation.zh: 我保证在你还没开始谈“认识论”之前 就把你送回去

translation.en: I'd love to, but I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我也很想去 但是没办法 抱歉

translation.en: I really am.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: Look, um… [clears throat]
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: …we… we at the philosophy department have very specific taste.
translation.zh: 我们哲学系的人 品味是很独特的

translation.en: You'd be surprised how hard it is
translation.zh: 说来可能你都难以置信

translation.en: to find someone so conversant in mind-body theory, so…

translation.en: we won't be filling the position with any other candidates.
translation.zh: 所以不会有其他任何人顶替你的位置

translation.en: If you change your mind, swing by.
translation.zh: 如果你改变主意了 过来看看吧

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [podcast host] In the context of lending transactions,
translation.zh: 在借贷交易中

translation.en: a clause which acts as a catch-all provision
translation.zh: 包罗条款的设置使得贷方

translation.en: and aims to allow the lender to call a default
translation.zh: 可以在特定情况下合理违约

translation.en: if there's an adverse change in the borrower's position or circumstance…
translation.zh: 例如借方的境况 发生严重不利的转变…

translation.en: Ted, Mark brought me up to speed about your budgetary concerns.
translation.zh: 泰德 马克向我说明了 你在预算方面的顾虑

translation.en: I had two senior associates on the matter
translation.zh: 基于这点 我的两位高级律师

translation.en: to make sure we were steering the ship correctly.
translation.zh: 会为我们保驾护航 确保无虞

translation.en: But going forward, we will keep just one.
translation.zh: 但之后的工作 我们只需要保留其一

translation.en: -[Lassiter] Much appreciated. -[Marty] So…
translation.zh: -非常感谢 马蒂 -那么…

translation.en: For starters, I think we should add in language about intangible goodwill assets.
translation.zh: 首先 我认为我们应该加入 对商誉这一无形资产的考量

translation.en: Min's brand is very valuable and they have good relationships with key suppliers.
translation.zh: 闵氏具有品牌价值 而且跟主要供应商的关系良好

translation.en: [Marty] Good idea. Thank you, Dan.

translation.en: I don't see a MAC clause. A Material Adverse Change clause.
translation.zh: 我认为需要加入重大不利变化条款

translation.en: It's a change in circumstance that affects a bargain
translation.zh: 以防在交易签署日和最终交割日之间

translation.en: after a deal's signed, but before it's closed.
translation.zh: 出现会影响交易的变化

translation.en: Something like an embargo, or a new tax law, or regulatory change.
translation.zh: 例如禁令的颁布、新税法的实施 或管制规定的改变

translation.en: It's always good to have a well-defined MAC clause.
translation.zh: 加入清楚明确的MAC条款 有备无患

translation.en: Mm-hmm. And speaking of regulatory,
translation.zh: 说到管制规定

translation.en: my buddy, Winston, is actually at the Department of Energy, in fossil fuels.

translation.en: Winston and I were in the Spee together.

translation.en: He's a very good friend,

translation.en: and it never hurts to have a friendly face at the DOE.

translation.en: Well, that could be very valuable indeed.

translation.en: Of course, that would all have to be official.
translation.zh: 当然 必须是公开正式的往来

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Okay. I think it makes sense to have Dan stay on and run point.

translation.en: Thank you, Yun. So we have a few…

translation.en: You stole my idea. "Intangibles"? "Goodwill assets"?

translation.en: You cheated.
translation.zh: 你这是作弊

translation.en: Not really.

translation.en: Just different rules.

translation.en: Dan won.

translation.en: If I don't make partner, everyone will know I couldn't cut it.

translation.en: I can't just lateral over to another firm.

translation.en: I'll be like Tara Grottaglia and go in-house at a urinary-device company.

translation.en: I play the game as well as he does. Better. Turns out they play by different rules.
translation.zh: 我的业务能力不比他差 我比他强 然而这里的游戏规则似乎不太一样

translation.en: I get it, Ing.

translation.en: You know I do.

translation.en: Oh God.

translation.en: Ever since I first saw New York.

translation.en: I don't know.

translation.en: -And I don't have a dress. -[sighs]

translation.en: Guess who I'm calling?

translation.en: I do live for this. I'm moving for this.

translation.en: -Okay. -Let's do this one.
translation.zh: -好 -试试这条吧

translation.en: -Well, I don't like that. -But we must do--

translation.en: That! Yes, yes.

translation.en: [Tyler] We must do a pink.

translation.en: Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes.

translation.en: -I love this. -Me too.

translation.en: Oh my God. You can.

translation.en: -I love a shoulder moment. -I live for this.

translation.en: I love it.

translation.en: Oh, our little girl's growing up.

translation.zh: 一下来了两个大帅哥 打破她平淡无奇的感情生活

translation.en: Well, I'm Team Nick. I'd love to get his sweet Loro Piana all up in a bunch.
translation.zh: 我支持尼克 他穿那身诺悠翩雅真是秀色可餐

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Wait. So no one's Team Marzipan?

translation.en: -Eh… -I mean…
translation.zh: 他啊…

translation.en: -You're going home alone. -[Ingrid] Oh my God.
translation.zh: -穿这身没人会搭理你 -天啊

translation.en: -[Tyler] Stunning. -Looking like that, I'd say option C.
translation.zh: -惊艳 -我看就这条了吧

translation.en: Team "All of the Above." -I love it. -Absolutely.
translation.zh: -我附议 绝对的 -特别好

translation.en: -That's beautiful. -It's so perfect.
translation.zh: -美极了 -简直完美

translation.en: That's how you get a man.
translation.zh: 绝对把男人迷得神魂颠倒

translation.en: Is this your business casual?
translation.zh: 这是你的商务休闲装吗？

translation.en: I'm happy you decided to come.
translation.zh: 你能来 我很高兴

translation.en: Yeah. I am too.

translation.en: [woman 6] Look, there's Nick.

translation.en: [woman 7] Great party, Nick.
translation.zh: 很棒的派对 尼克

translation.en: -[man 6] Lovely party, Nick. -Is this your party?
translation.zh: -派对不错 尼克 -这是你办的派对？

translation.en: I'm a… I'm a host.
translation.zh: 我是主办人之一

translation.en: [woman ] Ingrid.
translation.zh: 英格丽

translation.en: Nick, this is Francine Lindenhoff. She writes for the Financial Times.
translation.zh: 尼克 这位是弗朗欣林登霍夫 她是《金融时报》的记者

translation.en: -Oh hey. -Still no comment?
translation.zh: -你好 -还是不予置评吗？

translation.en: -About what? -Excuse me…
translation.zh: 关于什么？

translation.en: Ingrid, please excuse me.
translation.zh: 英格丽 失陪一下

translation.en: I'm running a piece Monday. Sun Corp's bidding for Min.
translation.zh: 我周一要报道 太阳集团投标闵氏的新闻

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 也许吧

translation.en: Ted Lassiter was seen entering Park Avenue Plaza twice this week.
translation.zh: 有人看见泰德拉希特 这周去了两次公园大道办公楼

translation.en: Maybe he likes artisanal espresso in the lobby.
translation.zh: 也许他爱喝大堂里的特浓咖啡吧

translation.en: What makes you think I'd be on the deal?
translation.zh: 你为什么觉得我在办这个案子？

translation.en: You were point on Parsons' last energy case.
translation.zh: 帕森上一个能源公司的案子 是由你主导的

translation.en: Francine, everyone knows Sun Corp's been sniffing around Min for years.
translation.zh: 弗朗欣 众所周知 太阳集团多年来一直对闵氏虎视眈眈

translation.en: It's not news.
translation.zh: 这不是新闻了

translation.en: You'll need a little more than that for a headline.
translation.zh: 就凭这些料 你拿不下头条

translation.en: Come on, Ingrid. We can help each other out.
translation.zh: 好啦 英格丽 我们可以互相帮衬嘛

translation.en: I'm a good friend to have.
translation.zh: 我是个值得一交的朋友

translation.en: [Tyler] There you are.
translation.zh: 你来啦

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: Hey. At least you had time to get that dress.
translation.zh: 嘿 至少你有时间去买裙子了

translation.en: I did you a favor with Sun Corp.
translation.zh: 太阳集团的事 你还得谢谢我呢

translation.en: Saved you from 100-hour work weeks. Is that what you really want?
translation.zh: 帮你省了100个小时的工作 你真想那么操劳吗？

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 你看啊

translation.en: We're gonna be 30 this year.
translation.zh: 今年我们就30岁了

translation.en: You're definitely not a bakkushan.
translation.zh: 你绝对称不上是恐龙

translation.en: Use it before you lose it.

translation.en: -Life of a politician. -And his fabulous plus-ones.
translation.zh: -政客嘛 -而且他要塑造公众形象啊

translation.en: -Smile and say, "five million followers." -Oh! Oh, hey! [chuckles]

translation.en: [Ingrid] "Faust and Mephistopheles"?
translation.zh: 《浮士德与梅菲斯托菲勒斯》？

translation.en: So what would you sell your soul for?
translation.zh: 你会为了什么出卖灵魂？

translation.en: Maybe a kiss?
translation.zh: 也许…一个吻？

translation.en: You know, "Lucifer" actually means "bringer of light."
translation.zh: 路西法其实是“光之使者”的意思

translation.en: Because meeting the devil illuminates the darkness within ourselves.
translation.zh: 因为邂逅恶魔 会点亮我们内心的黑暗

translation.en: -I love that we're both nerds. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 我们都是书呆子 太配了

translation.en: Murphy. I see you already know your way around town.
translation.zh: 墨菲 看来你已经熟悉这座城市了呢

translation.en: Oh, I'd never miss a chance to see you in a pretty dress.
translation.zh: 我不会错过看你穿礼服裙的机会

translation.en: Blue or pink.
translation.zh: 无论蓝色还是粉色

translation.en: [chuckles] Nick Laren, Jeff Murphy.
translation.zh: 尼克拉伦 杰夫墨菲

translation.en: We work together.

translation.en: -Pleasure. This is Christina. -[Nick] Oh.
translation.zh: 幸会 这是克里斯蒂娜

translation.en: Are you having a good time?
translation.zh: 玩得还开心吗？

translation.en: For the price of entry,
translation.zh: 入场费这么贵

translation.en: I would have at least hoped that the bubbly was vintage, but no go.
translation.zh: 我还以为能喝到上等的香槟呢 可惜事与愿违

translation.en: [Nick] Oh I'm sure we can manage that.
translation.zh: 这个不成问题

translation.en: Thanks, but, honestly, I think we might bounce.
translation.zh: 多谢 但老实说 我们可能要先走了

translation.en: This soirée's a little too self-satisfied even for me.
translation.zh: 这晚会到处透着洋洋自得的氛围 连我都有点吃不消

translation.en: Nick is actually one of the hosts.
translation.zh: 尼克是主办人之一

translation.en: Oh really? So I can complain to you directly about your taste in music.
translation.zh: 真的吗？那我不妨 当面吐槽你的音乐品味了

translation.en: Well, if you like, join the host committee next year,
translation.zh: 若你有兴趣的话 可以加入明年的主办委员会

translation.en: then you can ensure the entertainment and food are up to your standards.
translation.zh: 那你就能亲自确保 娱乐节目和餐饮的水准了

translation.en: For a nominal donation, of course.
translation.zh: 当然 只要提供小额捐赠就可以

translation.en: Oh, I hope the chocolate's not too self-satisfied for you.
translation.zh: 但愿这个巧克力 不会让你觉得它洋洋自得

translation.en: Marzipan.
translation.zh: 杏仁酱

translation.en: So, Ingrid.
translation.zh: 那么 英格丽

translation.en: You having a good time?
translation.zh: 你玩得开心吗？

translation.en: Actually, I'm having a great time.
translation.zh: 其实 我很享受

translation.en: Come on. I wanna dance.
translation.zh: 来吧 我想去跳舞

translation.en: Have fun.
translation.zh: 玩得开心点

translation.en: I'm so thirsty. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我口渴了 去去就回

translation.en: -[man 7] Upsy-daisy. -[Ingrid] Sorry. Here. Let me help you.
translation.zh: -哎呀 -抱歉 我扶你起来

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Winston Keil. Buddy of Nick Laren's.
translation.zh: 我叫温斯顿基尔 是尼克拉伦的朋友

translation.en: Oh, how do you know Nick?
translation.zh: 你俩怎么认识的？

translation.en: Went to school together.
translation.zh: 我们是老同学

translation.en: Then worked for his dad before I went to the Department of Energy.
translation.zh: 我去能源部之前 还在他爸手下工作过一段时间

translation.en: Winston. Department of… Do you know Dan Fallon?
translation.zh: 温斯顿 能源…你认识丹法伦吗？

translation.en: Dan's my man. He's on fire with this Sun Corp deal.
translation.zh: 丹是我哥们 他正为了 太阳集团的交易案火力全开呢

translation.en: -You know about it. -All 2.9 billion of it.
translation.zh: -你知道这事啊 -29亿呢 我全知道

translation.en: But you didn't hear it from me.
translation.zh: 不过 我可什么都没告诉你哦

translation.en: Hear what?
translation.zh: 告诉我什么？

translation.en: It was nice meeting you, but I got a thirsty lady waiting.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 但那边还有位小姐等着跟我喝一杯呢

translation.en: Thanks for your help.
translation.zh: 感谢帮忙

translation.en: My pleasure.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: [Ingrid whispers] Francine.
translation.zh: 弗朗欣

translation.en: Nick, I'm so sorry, but I have to go.
translation.zh: 尼克 对不起 我得走了

translation.en: Well, I promise my hip-hop's better.
translation.zh: 我保证我放的嘻哈音乐会更好听

translation.en: No. It's just I… I have to work.
translation.zh: 不是 我有工作要干

translation.en: I'll walk you out.
translation.zh: 我送你出去

translation.en: It's okay. You're a host, so host.
translation.zh: 不用了 你是主办人 好好主持舞会吧

translation.en: Well, that was worth the price.
translation.zh: 有这一吻 我今夜无憾了

translation.en: He knew the purchase price.
translation.zh: 他知道买价

translation.en: If that gets out before the term sheet's signed…
translation.zh: 如果这消息 在投资意向书签订前泄露出去…

translation.en: [Rachel] He was drunk. It won't come out.
translation.zh: 他喝醉了 不会有事的

translation.en: But if it leaks, there won't be a deal.
translation.zh: 但万一他说漏嘴 交易就泡汤了

translation.en: At least not for Parsons.
translation.zh: 至少帕森是没戏了

translation.en: If you do this, won't Dan get in trouble?
translation.zh: 你这么做的话 丹会有麻烦吧？

translation.en: I'm protecting the deal and protecting the client. The firm.
translation.zh: 我是为了确保交易顺利进行 维护客户和公司的利益

translation.en: Okay. Well, do what you have to do, then.
translation.zh: 好吧 那你就放手去做

translation.en: You got this.
translation.zh: 你可以的

translation.en: Excuse me for a second. Uh you're a bit overdressed.
translation.zh: 失陪一下 你穿得有点过于隆重了吧

translation.en: Yun, what's going on?
translation.zh: 允 出什么事了？

translation.en: I was at the Plaza, and ran into a friend who works at the Financial Times.
translation.zh: 我在广场酒店遇到了 一个在《金融时报》工作的朋友

translation.en: They said they're running a piece on Sun Corp Monday.
translation.zh: 他们周一要报道关于太阳集团的新闻

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Justin?
translation.zh: 贾斯汀？

translation.en: Yeah. His dad, Leonard Coleman, is a good friend. Wait, wait.
translation.zh: 对 他爸爸莱纳德科曼 是我的好朋友 慢着

translation.en: Who is their source?
translation.zh: 他们从哪得来的消息？

translation.en: I think someone at the DOE.
translation.zh: 应该是能源部的某个人

translation.en: Dan's guy.
translation.zh: 丹的朋友

translation.en: W… Well, everyone knows that Lassiter's been looking for an LNG play.
translation.zh: 拉希特想拓展液化气生意 这件事人尽皆知

translation.en: He knows the purchase price. Fuck! Fuck!
translation.zh: -他知道买价 -该死！

translation.en: If I may, I have an idea.
translation.zh: 恕我冒昧 我有一个主意

translation.en: Great. Come inside.
translation.zh: 很好 进去说吧

translation.en: Okay. So, I'm basically thinking that…
translation.zh: 好 基本上 我的想法是…

translation.en: Looks like you had an even crazier night than me.
translation.zh: 看起来你今晚过得比我还快活啊

translation.en: Lina, what… what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 莉娜 你怎么在这儿？

translation.en: I dropped out.
translation.zh: 我退学了

translation.en: What? Why?
translation.zh: 什么？为什么？

translation.en: Juilliard's a bastion of outdated posers who've internalized the patriarchy.
translation.zh: 茱莉亚学院里全是装腔作势 满脑子父权思想的人

translation.en: Lina, you can't just waltz in here.
translation.zh: 你不能就这么大摇大摆地跑过来

translation.en: If you're gonna start lecturing, I'd really rather sleep in the park.
translation.zh: 你要开始说教的话 我还是去公园里睡吧

translation.en: Honestly, I'm too tired to deal with your drama right now.
translation.zh: 我现在身心疲惫 没力气跟你闹

translation.en: You can stay, but I'm gonna tell Mom you're here.
translation.zh: 你可以留下 但我会告诉妈妈你在这里

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 行啊

translation.en: -I need to be back at the office. -Sure.
translation.zh: -我得回办公室了 -好

translation.en: This deal could get me junior partner.
translation.zh: 这笔交易能让我升上初级合伙人

translation.en: I'll be back Monday.
translation.zh: 我周一回来

translation.en: Go! Go make junior president or whatever.
translation.zh: 去吧！去当个初级总统什么的吧

translation.en: Have to get this term sheet signed before the article comes out.
translation.zh: 这份文件 必须在新闻发表之前签署完毕

translation.en: So, for the next 60 hours, you're mine. Let's get to work.
translation.zh: 所以接下来的60个小时 你们听我指挥 开工吧

translation.en: Can you give me that other file? There.
translation.zh: 麻烦把那份文件递给我

translation.en: …with this deal. $2.9 billion.
translation.zh: …这笔交易 29亿美元

translation.en: Look at this.
translation.zh: 看看这个

translation.en: Can you get on the…
translation.zh: 你能继续…

translation.en: No message from them? I'm sure they'll be here any minute.
translation.zh: -没有他们的消息吗？ -他们应该很快就到了

translation.en: [clears throat] I understand somebody asked for an autograph.
translation.zh: 之前是不是有人跟我要签名来着？

translation.en: Thank you so much for helping expedite the process this weekend.
translation.zh: 感谢您周末拨冗前来 加快交易进程

translation.en: [Min] You remember my sons Carter, Min's general counsel, and Z.
translation.zh: 记得我的儿子们吧？这是小Z 还有卡特 闵氏的法律总顾问

translation.en: Carter.
translation.zh: 你好 卡特

translation.en: -What's up, man? -Good to see you. Z.
translation.zh: -你好 -幸会 小Z

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: I haven't worked this hard since… [scoffs] …law school.
translation.zh: 自从法学院毕业后 我就没这么勤奋过了

translation.en: But yeah, let's expedite the shit out of this.
translation.zh: 不过挺好 我们来速战速决吧

translation.en: -I wish my son were that spirited. -That's one word for it.
translation.zh: -真希望我儿子也这么有干劲 -您太客气了

translation.en: We hope the rest of the process will be less expedited, more prudent.
translation.zh: 希望接下来的流程 大家慎重对待 不要操之过急

translation.en: [Z] Yes. We look forward to discussing your plans for integration,
translation.zh: 是的 我们很期待 此次关于合并计划的讨论

translation.en: especially regarding GreenTech.
translation.zh: 尤其是在绿色科技方面

translation.en: Seeing as you've run roughshod over every previous attempt--
translation.zh: 考虑到贵公司以往的作风 一向是独断专行…

translation.en: My sons and I look forward to our partnership.
translation.zh: 我和我儿子们 都很期待跟你们建立伙伴关系

translation.en: [Marty] Excellent.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Shall we?
translation.zh: 我们开始吧？

translation.en: As you know, we've coordinated with the Financial Times
translation.zh: 我们已与《金融时报》协作

translation.en: for an exclusive to help shape the message.
translation.zh: 他们将配合发布专题报道 传递这一信息

translation.en: I guess we're engaged.
translation.zh: 看来我们是订婚了

translation.en: After these cats finish the paperwork, you can kiss the bride.
translation.zh: 等到文书工作结束以后 你就能亲吻新娘了

translation.en: Shall we meet halfway, Mr. Min?
translation.zh: 我们彼此各退一步？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Marty] We're gonna make this work.
translation.zh: （突发新闻 太阳集团收购闵氏） 我们会合作愉快的

translation.en: -[Min] Excellent. -[Marty] It'll be wonderful.
translation.zh: -太好了 -未来可期 （弗朗欣：谢了）

translation.en: -[Lassiter] Frank. -Ted.
translation.zh: -弗兰克 -泰德

translation.en: -Thank you, Marty. -Congratulations.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 马蒂 -恭喜

translation.en: Yun, what the hell?
translation.zh: 允 怎么回事？

translation.en: If you're on time, you're late.
translation.zh: 踩点等于迟到

translation.en: Well, what'd I tell you? Best and the brightest.
translation.zh: 我怎么说的来着？这就叫顶尖精英

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Yun'll run point and close the deal.
translation.zh: 允会主导后续事宜 完成交易

translation.en: -That work for you? -[Lassiter] Sure. Why the hell not?
translation.zh: -你意下如何？ -当然 有何不可呢？

translation.en: [Marty] Good. We'll get into due diligence and bring this baby home.
translation.zh: 好的 我们会尽责查证 达成交易

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: I played by your rules.
translation.zh: 我参考了你的游戏规则

translation.en: -[Marty] Anyone for a drink? -[Min] Best idea I've heard all day.
translation.zh: -有人要喝酒吗？ -正合我意

translation.en: I hear congratulations are in order.
translation.zh: 我听说该恭喜你了

translation.en: You single-handedly saved the Min deal.
translation.zh: 你凭一己之力挽救了闵氏的案子

translation.en: Are those from the most eligible bachelor in New York?
translation.zh: 那是纽约的钻石单身汉送的花？

translation.en: It was just a date. [clears throat]
translation.zh: 只是约会过一次而已

translation.en: Francine.
translation.zh: 弗朗欣

translation.en: Such an old-fashioned name.
translation.zh: 真是个老套的名字

translation.en: Well, congratulations.
translation.zh: 恭喜你

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I do remember, by the way.
translation.zh: 还有 我真的记得

translation.en: Rosecliff.
translation.zh: 罗斯克利夫

translation.en: Marzipan. Pineapple.
translation.zh: 杏仁酱 菠萝

translation.en: I remember all of it.
translation.zh: 我全都记得
